reviews.title: Great

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great quality product to use for cleaning carpet. It is lightweight and easy to lift.I love cleaning with it. I love the fact that it is cordless and all I had to do was charge it with the charger. I love using it.

I love these Suede Mules they are so comfortable and well made. You can't find them at a better price. Hope to purchase more in the future.

the problem with this electric blanket is it the control is at the bottom not up top you have to turn it on before you can get underneath it then if you want to change the temperature you got to get up and change it and then get back into bed the control unit should be closer to the end of the plug where you plug it into the wall so that way you can reach it from the top of the bed to where now it's at the bottom of the bed because it's at the bottom of the blanket where it plugs into the blanket to me that is the bottom of the blanket and the control unit should be closer to the top so that you don't have to get out of bed to change the temperature so I do not recommend this unless you're just going to use it as a throw blanket to where you can reach the control without having to get up but as it is I give it a two star cuz it is nice it is fluffy it is warm but they need to rethink the cord and the control to make it a better item

reviews.title: Great buy, no disappointment.
reviews.review_text: My husband loves this jacket for working outside and for ice fishing. As long as the battery is fully charged, it'll last all day. It's his favorite present. The size guide is accurate.
Just wish they had a light on it like older models.

reviews.title: Gets clogged very easily!!!
reviews.review_text: Ive had this less than a month and I bought it to pick up small leaves and dirt that my dogs bring in from outside. It cant even do that right. It gets hung up in the neck of the brush head and I spend most of my time cleaning that out. Nothing makes it to the cup. And these are small leaves the size of a thumb print. So disappointed. Dont bother.

reviews.title: Mediocre
reviews.review_text: It does not keep a charge very long and suction is just ok. I prefer the corded as I feel they are stronger vacuums.

reviews.title: This vacuum doesn't suck, literally.
reviews.review_text: This vacuums battery life is the actual worst. You can't even get an HOUR total of vacuuming done on a full charge. You can't get anything bigger with it (like cat food) unless you take off the bottom and use the hose. It has minimal power to even suck up cat litter off of vinyl flooring. Glad I got it at a major discount so I didn't waste MORE money than I already have with it.

soft and comfortable. once you get the buttons to stop sticking it works fine. just remember that sometimes it takes up to 8 seconds to turn on when holding the button. it doesnt have 6 heat settings as advertised and only stays on 4 hours not 1-9 hours as advertised also.
